metadata.title: CVE-2024-35857 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: icmp:prevent possible NULL dereferences from icmp_build_probe() First problem isa double call to __in_dev_get_rcu(), because the second one could returnNULL. if (__in_dev_get_rcu(dev) && __in_dev_get_rcu(dev)->ifa_list) Secondproblem is a read from dev->ip6_ptr with no NULL check: if(!list_empty(&rcu_dereference(dev->ip6_ptr)->addr_list)) Use the correctRCU API to fix these. v2: add missing include <net/addrconf.h>

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
